abstract: Microsoft reported surprisingly strong quarterly profits and sales growth in its core software products, sending its stock up 12 percent in after-hours trading.
snippet: Microsoft reported surprisingly strong quarterly profits and sales growth in its core software products, sending its stock up 12 percent in after-hours trading.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft reported strong quarterly sales and profit growth yesterday, surprising Wall Street analysts with the sales of its core software products.

headline.main: Microsoft Reports Strong Gain on Sales of PC and Server Software
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Reports Strong Gain on Sales of PC and Server Software
